ComicInfo.Summary:
Delina, Shandie, and Krydle fight to hold back the hordes of devils attacking Elturel while Minsc and Nerys struggle to survive the Blood War raging below! Souls and sanity are set to crumble as the Infernal Tides roll in!
Dungeons & Dragons established the roleplaying game category with great storytelling for both tabletop and video game audiences. It continues to be a cultural force in bookstores and online!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Max Dunbar (a) & Sebastian Cheng (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Max Dunbar (a) & Jim Zub (w) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Max Dunbar | 3 |
